content: देय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दा कर्मणि यत्] {@--1@} To be given, offered or presented; <ls>R. 3. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Fit to be given, proper for a gift. {@--3@} To be returned or restored; विभावितैकदेशेन देयं यदभियुज्यते <ls>V. 4. 17</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 139</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">185.</ls> {@--4@} To be shown. {@--5@} To be given in marriage. {@--6@} To be paid (as a debt &c.). {@--7@} To be placed, put, applied, laid, &c.; see दा above. --यं A gift, donation.
